message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about magnetic properties of materials. Iron is a magnetic material, so if a person wants to attract metals, they would choose iron pebbles as they have magnetic properties that can attract metals. Option (A) is incorrect because ceramic stones are not magnetic. Option (C) and (D) are also incorrect because glass and plastic do not have magnetic properties.

Therefore, if a person wants to mine something that will attract metals, they should search out iron pebbles. Options (A), (C), and (D) are all non-magnetic materials and would not attract metals.

Option (A) suggests searching for ceramic stones, which are not magnetic. Option (C) suggests searching for glass beads, which are also not magnetic. Option (D) suggests searching for plastic beads, which are not magnetic either. Therefore, option (B) is the best choice for attracting metals.
